entry.title: HI STAR SNEAKER IN BLACK LEATHER
entry.summary:
Vendor: GOLDEN GOOSE
Type: SNEAKER
Price: 650.00

Golden Goose proves that craftsmanship is more than just keeping things pristine - its sneakers have been carefully distressed for a loved-worn look. This 'Hi Star' pair is in black leathers trimmed with white leather. Wear yours with midi skirts or  jeans.g

  • Details: White leather star and back detail, lace-up front, heel measures approx. 1"
  • Material: Leather upper and rubber sole
  • Item fits true to size, available in whole sizes only
  • Made in Italy

entry.title: *pre-order* TEDDY COAT IN ULTRAMARINE
entry.summary:
Vendor: MAX MARA
Type: COAT
Price: 4490.00

Max Mara's 'Tedgirl' coat is such a luxurious yet versatile piece. It's been crafted in Italy from plush alpaca-blend with touches of wool and silk for added softness. The relaxed silhouette ensures it layers comfortably over chunky knits.

  • Details: Button fastenings through double breasted front
  • Material: 62% alpaca, 26% wool, 12% silk | buttons: 100% horn (cow) | lining: 100% viscose
  • Fits true to size, take your normal size, model wears a size XS
  • Designed for a relaxed fit and is sized for layering, those with a petite frame may wish to take the next size down
  • Dry clean
  • Made in Italy

entry.title: HAVE A NICE DAY SMILEY GANNI GRAPHIC ISOLI PULLOVER
entry.summary:
Vendor: GANNI
Type: SWEATSHIRT
Price: 215.00

Oversized pullover in recycled isoli, featuring boxy raglan elbow-length sleeves and a signature GANNI logo & Have a Nice Day Smiley graphic. Style with your favourite GANNI jeans or coordinate with isoli shorts.

100% RECYCLED BLEND

This piece is made of 50% recycled cotton and 50% recycled polyester. Using recycled fibers decreases the demand for virgin fibers and significantly lowers the environmental footprint of a garment.
  • Super boxy oversized silhouette cropped to normal hip-length
  • Raglan sleeves
  • Pronounced round neck hem
  • High-low hemline slightly longer in the back with side slits
  • Classic heavyweight, structured, sweatshirt-fabric with stretch
  • The model is 175 cm and wears a size EU 36

entry.title: CRYSTAL EMBELISHED RIBBED CARDIGAN IN EGRET
entry.summary:
Vendor: GANNI
Type: SWEATER
Price: 450.00

GANNI's cardigan is dotted with the brand's signature crystal-embellished buttons - they make this classic style feel instantly more special. It's spun from recycled wool-blend and has a tightly ribbed finish. It looks equally cool worn open over dresses or half-tucked into jeans.

  • Details: Ecru recycled wool-blend, button fastenings through front, mid-weight knit, designed for a loose fit
  • Material: 60% recycled wool, 18% polyester, 10% wool, 7% recycled polyester, 5% other fibers
  • Item fits true to size, model wears a size S
  • Dry clean
  • Made in Italy

entry.title: RUFFLED ORGANIC DENIM SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: GANNI
Type: TOP
Price: 395.00

The oversized ruffled collar of GANNI's shirt is a detail seen throughout the brand's Pre-Fall '21 collection - it adds a playful touch to the otherwise simple design. It's cut from faded light-blue denim composed of GOTS-certified organic cotton and REFIBRA™ blend and has a comfortably loose fit. Wear yours tucked into slick leather pants.

  • Details: Snap button front, v-neckline, straight fit
  • Material: 100% cotton
  • Item fits true to size, model wears a size 36
  • Machine wash cold, lay flat to dry
  • Impored

entry.title: RECYCLED RUBBER CITY BOOT IN BLACK
entry.summary:
Vendor: GANNI
Type: BOOTS
Price: 345.00

Recycled rubber ankle boots with elastic chelsea-style panels and tab details. Style with a hooded knit and mini skirt. These boots are made from a blend of recycled rubber and are not water proof.

  • Fit true to size
  • Comfortable, 4 cm platform/flat sole
  • Chunky, ribbed, rubber soles
  • Round toe
  • Chelsea style, slip on with elastic and front/back pull-tabs
  • Matte, leather-look 50% recycled rubber + 50% rubber material
  • Made in Portugal

50% RECYCLED RUBBER
These styles are made from 50% pre-consumer recycled rubber – the scraps and cut-offs from the production of rubber shoes.
Pre-consumer means the elements that would usually be treated as waste, are reused in production again.
